NK040(thi)023:2: rje btsun mkha' 'gro'i lha tshogs 'grub par gyur cig /
NK040(thi)023:3: dbyangs gsal rten brgya rten snying rnams lan gsum re bzlas la /
NK040(thi)023:5: h'u h+r+aih yon chab khrus chab bdug spos sna tshogs dang //
NK040(thi)023:6: me tog mar me dri bzang mchod pa'i sprin //
NK040(thi)023:7: zhal zas sgra snyan rol mo sna tshogs dang //
NK040(thi)023:8: gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos la sogs //
NK040(thi)023:9: bla ma d+aak+ki'i tshogs la mchod pa 'bul //
NK040(thi)023:10: thugs rje brtser dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol //
NK040(thi)023:11: +aahmh'u gu ru d+he wa d+aak+ki ar+g+ham sogs nas shap+da r+au pa sogs /
NK040(thi)023:12: spar+she ma h+aa pany+tsa a mri ta ma h+aa rak+ta ma h+aa ba ling+ta kha hi /
NK040(thi)023:14: ma chos dbyings rnam dag skye med chos kyi dbyings //
NK040(thi)023:15: 'gags med rtsa bral sems nyid don gyi ngang //
NK040(thi)023:16: mtha' dbus med pa mtha' bral stong pa'i yum //
NK040(thi)023:17: ma yum chen chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK040(thi)023:18: 'gyur ba med pa rdo rje'i sku sprul ma //
NK040(thi)023:19: dgos 'dod kun 'byung rin chen sku sprul ma //
NK040(thi)023:20: gdod nas dag pa pad+ma'i sku sprul ma //
NK040(thi)023:21: phrin las grub pa las kyi sku sprul ma //
NK040(thi)023:22: ma yum chen sku lnga lhun grub ma la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK040(thi)023:24: dge ba 'di yi mkha' 'gro sde lnga'i lha tshogs
NK040(thi)023:25: 'gro ba thams cad de yi sa la 'god par
